vote.title: Authorize a three-year master agreement for the purchase of laboratory equipment and supplies for the Water Utilities Department - Taylor Distribution Group, LLC dba TDG Scientific in an estimated amount of $3,371,448.64, Hach Company in an estimated amount of $1,212,513.21, and Fox Scientific, Inc. in an estimated amount of $146,237.16, lowest responsible bidders of six - Total estimated amount of $4,730,199.01 - Financing:  Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($4,680,166.91) and Stormwater Drainage Management Fund ($50,032.10)
vote.description: Authorize a three-year master agreement for the purchase of laboratory equipment and supplies for the Water Utilities Department - Taylor Distribution Group, LLC dba TDG Scientific in an estimated amount of $3,371,448.64, Hach Company in an estimated amount of $1,212,513.21, and Fox Scientific, Inc. in an estimated amount of $146,237.16, lowest responsible bidders of six - Total estimated amount of $4,730,199.01 - Financing:  Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($4,680,166.91) and Stormwater Drainage Management Fund ($50,032.10)
